00053 #ifndef _CTRL_STATUS_H_
00054 #define _CTRL_STATUS_H_
00055 
00056 //_____ D E F I N I T I O N S ______________________________________________
00057 
00059 typedef enum
00060 {
00061    CTRL_GOOD         =(PASS  )  // It is ready
00062 ,  CTRL_FAIL         =(FAIL  )  // Memory fail
00063 ,  CTRL_NO_PRESENT   =(FAIL+1)  // Memory unplug
00064 ,  CTRL_BUSY         =(FAIL+2)  // Not initialize
00065 } Ctrl_status;
00066 
00067 #endif   // _CTRL_STATUS_H_
